The Oblitercons:




Dark One stood, staring at the two robots formerly known as Breakdown and 
Scavenger.  He brought a hand up to hold his chin, "Hmmmming" every few 
seconds.

"Well, what do you think?" Hiss asked in delight.  "I did do a good job, 
didn't I?"

"What'd he do!  I bet he buthcered my once great looks, right?" the former 
Breakdown yelled, getting up and looking around for something that would 
reflect his image.

"I don't think so.  If anything I feel stronger.  What did you do to us, 
exactly, Hiss?" Scavenger asked, rubbing his hands on his face, noticing 
significant changes.

"Basically I added some weapons, changed parts of your face, added on armor, 
modified your alternate modes, and added extra power cells inside your frame 
so you will perform 60% better than usual.  Oh, and I increased your height 
by one foot."

"That's it?"

"Well, Pyro, I wasn't provided with much energon."

"We have to conserve our energon, Hiss." Dark One remarked.  "Anyway, 
Breakdown and Scavenger are your old names, you need new ones.  How about 
Mortar and Scrounge?"

"I liked Breakdown better."

"And I liked Scavenger better.  Scrounge sounds like the name of some Earth 
pet."

"Shut up!  You'll do as I say.  You're much stronger.  We just need an 
opportunity to test your newfound abilities.  Will there be any changes to 
Oblitertron, Hiss?"

"He'll be a little stronger but not by a marginal amount.  If we want 
Oblitertron stronger I'd have to specifically work on that area, not those 
two."

"Oh, well." Pyro said with a grin.  "When do I get to be upgraded?"

"You don't need to so you won't." Dark One said.
